title: Mordekaiser's Q does not Proc Fiora's W
body:
As stated in the title, Mordekaiser's Enhanced Auto, with his Q, does not Proc Fiora's W, please fix as soon as you can, thanks for all your hard work :)

- Emleon

replies.body: >**DO NOT** post bug reports here. Instead, head on over to our [Report a Bug](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) board.
